description:
"Ecclesia" is punished for trying to protect the wounded boy.
In a desperate attempt to save the suffering girl before him, the boy throws himself forward, transforming into a dragon once again by absorbing power from nearby.
Seizing this opportunity, the "Tri-Brigade" spring into action to rescue their captured comrades. In response, the zealots of "Dogmatika" rise to eliminate the heretics. The battle on the ground descends into chaos.
Far above, in the skies, "Fleurdelis" rushes to reach Ecclesia, only to be intercepted by "Shuraig," who stands in her way with unwavering resolve.
Source: Official English Website
